\documentclass[english]{article}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage[latin9]{inputenc}
\usepackage{array}
\usepackage{multirow}

\makeatletter

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% LyX specific LaTeX commands.
%% Because html converters don't know tabularnewline
\providecommand{\tabularnewline}{\\}

\makeatother

\usepackage{babel}
\begin{document}
\begin{tabular}{cccc|c}
\hline 
\multicolumn{4}{c|}{Atributos} & \multirow{2}{*}{Classe}\tabularnewline
\cline{1-4} 
Pressão (atm) & Amplitude Sísmica & Vel. Vento (km/h) & Temp. (C) & \tabularnewline
1 & 10 & 2.2 & 26.0 & 2\tabularnewline
0.8 & 1000 & 0.0 & 15.5 & 4\tabularnewline
1.7 & 100 & 0.4 & 31.2 & 3\tabularnewline
0.4 & 10000000 & 6.0 & 7.4 & 8\tabularnewline
\hline 
\end{tabular}
\end{document}
